name: Sub-Scan [A26]
description:
WIP!!! This game doesn't work yet on itch.io and we're making some finishing touches, but if you wanna play it in its unfinished state, head on over to subsim.io.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to Sub Sub Sub 2: Sub Sub Sub Sub, a realistic stealth simulation game where staying undetected is quite literally, a matter of degree. The year is 2030. The United States is a shattered mess, and every Seattle hipster's dream has come true. Cascadia. It's a reality now. Complicating things for the new republic, the former United States has stationed a Virginia class submarine in the Puget Sound to block incoming shipments of supplies. The rebels have managed to secure SSN-22, a Seawolf class submarine of their own. Unfortunately, nobody really knows how to pilot it so everyone's just making it up as they go along.

Take on the role of captain and break the blockade, or you can be evil and take control of the Virginia class sub, I guess.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Sub Sub Sub Sub is a PvP multiplayer game, so grab a friend and enter the same game code to see who's better at figuring out how to read sonar. Play on itch.io or grab the latest version at subsim.io.

Credits: Ellen Poe worked on the backend stuff and got sonar simulation working. Evin Sellin did all kinds of cool frontend stuff.
